main event: A 12-year-old boy observed a small white light moving southward in Stamford, Connecticut on December 31, 1967.
interesting points: The object was first mistaken for a satellite before it changed direction and moved westward,The observation was classified as ground visual and lasted several minutes,The observer provided insufficient information for a complete investigation,The report included a request for additional details by the Air Force,It was mentioned that the boy was only 12 years of age.
sighted object: small white light in the sky
